data.description_html:
Your touch becomes poisonous, inflicting poison upon a creature you touch with a successful melee touch attack.
The poison deals 1d6 points of temporary Constitution damage immediately and another 1d6 points of temporary Constitution damage 1 minute later.
Each instance of damage can be negated by a Fortitude save (DC 10 + 1/2 caster's level + caster's Intelligence modifier).
Focus: A tattoo of a toad on your skin.
data.name: Kiss of the Toad
